value:
$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Princess Caeda, are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|Sorry for the wait, Ogma. We had
a great time shopping, though!$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|I'm glad to hear it.$k$p$WmMPID_プルメリア味方,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|Dream-King Freyr, what do you think
of Lady Freyja's new flower? It suits
her well, don't you think?$k$p$WmMPID_水着フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Swim21,Face|Yes... It is...truly beautiful.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Swim21,Face|Oh, Brother, you are too kind...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_05,0|$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|...Princess Caeda? Where have you
gotten off to?$k$p$WmMPID_シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Normal,Face|Over here, Ogma!$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Ah, there you are.$k$p$WmMPID_シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Normal,Face|I appreciate your constant vigilance,
Ogma, but I am fine, I assure you.$k$pWith you, Prince Marth, and everyone
else I hold dear so close by, I am
very happy—and very safe.$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|You flatter me with such kindness.
But no matter how safe you are, I will
remain at your side to protect you.$k$p$WmMPID_シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Normal,Face|And I am thankful for that, but...I ask
that you find time to rest. We have
come all this way to be here after all.$k$pSo, sit! Let's take in the sights and
sounds of this world's shores and
enjoy our time here together.$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Of course...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|$Fi1500|Ogma... Ogma...$k$pAre you awake now?$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Princess...Caeda?$k$pI was...asleep? I don't...$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|I asked Dream-King Freyr to give
you a nice dream!$k$pSorry to be so selfish, but, since we
arrived at the beach, you wanted only
to watch over and protect me, so...$k$pI wanted to give you some peace
of mind by letting you enjoy a nice
dream while you took some rest.$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|...I see. Well, it was indeed a good
dream, that much is true.$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|I'm so glad to hear that! You deserve
a nice, pleasant rest for all the help
you've given me.$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|You need not trouble yourself so,
but...I am grateful you did.$k$p$WmMPID_プルメリア味方,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|If it was a dream from Dream-King
Freyr, it must have been a truly
wonderful dream, hm?$k$pIt is quite the rare occurrence for
Dream-King Freyr to answer the
requests of a mortal.$k$p$nMPID_双界シーダ|Yes, you make a good point. I must
be sure to express my gratitude to
Dream-King Freyr.$k$pOh, I know! What if we made him
a bouquet of flowers we found
here at the beach?$k$p$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Splendid idea. I'll help!$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Then I, too, will accompany you,
Princess Caeda. I ought to lend
my services in thanks as well.$k$p$WmMPID_双界シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_FF_Pair,Face|Of course!$k$p$Sbs150|
